nodes.description: 2019年2月16日伊朗伊صفان发生自杀式汽车爆炸袭击，造成革命卫队27人死亡
nodes.support_text: Mourners carry flag-draped caskets during a mass funeral for those killed in a suicide car bombing that targeted members of Iran’s powerful Revolutionary Guard in earlier in the week, killing at least 27 people, in Isfahan, Iran, Saturday, Feb. 16, 2019.

nodes.description: 革命卫队领导人威胁对沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国实施报复
nodes.support_text: The head of the Guard has threatened to retaliate against neighboring Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates over the bombing.

nodes.description: 伊朗议会 speaker周日（2月17日）指控巴基斯坦策划并实施袭击
nodes.support_text: Iran’s parliament speaker said Sunday that an attack that killed 27 members of Iran’s elite Revolutionary Guard was ‘planned and carried out from inside Pakistan,’ which he said should answer for it.

nodes.description: 伊朗外交部召见巴基斯坦大使以示抗议
nodes.support_text: Iran’s Foreign Ministry summoned Pakistan’s ambassador on Sunday to protest the attack.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦外长与伊朗外长通话承诺全面配合调查
nodes.support_text: Shah Mahmood Qureshi... spoke with his Iranian counterpart, Mohammad Javad Zarif, by phone on Sunday to assure him that Pakistan would fully cooperate in the investigation.

nodes.description: 革命卫队总司令指责巴基斯坦安全部队支持袭击者Jaish al-Adl组织
nodes.support_text: The head of Iran’s powerful Revolutionary Guard, Maj. Gen. Mohammad Ali Jafari, on Saturday accused Pakistan’s security forces of supporting the militants and said Iran expects it to ‘punish’ them.

nodes.description: 伊朗总统Rouhani公开誓言对烈士家属实施报复
nodes.support_text: Iran’s President Hassan Rouhani meanwhile vowed ‘revenge for the blood of these martyrs,’ in remarks broadcast Sunday on state TV.

nodes.description: 沙特王储推迟一天行程后原定于周日访问巴基斯坦
nodes.support_text: Saudi Arabia’s Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman is expected to visit Pakistan Sunday after delaying his arrival by one day without providing an explanation.
Jaish al-Adl组织声称对此次袭击负责

nodes.description: 伊朗国家电视台广播了总统的声明
nodes.support_text: Iran’s President Hassan Rouhani meanwhile vowed ‘revenge for the blood of these martyrs,’ in remarks broadcast Sunday on state TV.

nodes.description: 鲁哈尼表示了这些言论
nodes.support_text: 伊朗议会 speaker周日（2月17日）指控巴基斯坦策划并实施袭击

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦尝试维持与沙特和伊朗之间的平衡
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：巴基斯坦尝试维持（与沙特和伊朗之间的）平衡

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦维持与沙特和伊朗之间的平衡
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：巴基斯坦维持（与沙特和伊朗之间的）平衡

edges.support_text: The head of the Guard has threatened to retaliate against neighboring Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates over the bombing.
The head of the Guard, Maj. Gen. Mohammad Ali Jafari, on Saturday accused Pakistan’s security forces...
Iran’s President Hassan Rouhani meanwhile vowed ‘revenge for the blood of these martyrs,’...
After the bombing, Maj. Gen. Mohammad Ali Jafari accused Pakistan’s security forces...
Iran’s Foreign Ministry summoned Pakistan’s ambassador on Sunday to protest the attack.
伊朗议会 speaker周日（2月17日）指控巴基斯坦策划并实施袭击后，革命卫队总司令指责巴基斯坦安全部队支持袭击者Jaish al-Adl组织
Shah Mahmood Qureshi spoke with his Iranian counterpart Zarif to assure cooperation...
Mohammed bin Salman was expected to visit Pakistan Sunday after delaying his arrival...
Meanwhile, Rouhani vowed ‘revenge for the blood of these martyrs,’ broadcast Sunday on state TV.
革命卫队总司令指责巴基斯坦安全部队支持Jaish al-Adl组织后，Jaish al-Adl声称了责任
伊朗国家电视台广播总统声明后，鲁哈尼进一步表态
根据temporal_order 1在前，2在后建立时序关系
